div.p:
Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis Nouembris Anno Dominj Millesimo Quingentesimo nono

div.head: Evin quarter
div.p:
The said day thir ar the Names of the broustaris giffin be the officiar
of the Evin quarter that is to say Normond' of lesly

ffre

div.p:

div.head: ffuty quarter
div.p:
Thir ar the names of the broustaris fre and onfre of the futy quarter
giffin In be Wilyeame scrimgeour officiar of the samyne
ffre
The wife of Johnne ramsay
the wif of Dauid brois'
the wif of gilbert paule

The xiij day of the monetht of Nouember the yeir forsaid It was statut
and ordanit be the bailyeis that ale the broustaris within this burgh' sall brew
gud sufficient and prouabile' aile for vj d' the galone and na derrar'
to be sellit vnder the pane of law

fyve and ten' yeris the copy of the act'
the offering Candilmes day eftir follouys on

head.add: the of the processone candilmes' day of the craftismen of the tovne'

div.p:
fundin be the auld lovable' Consuetud and Rite of the
the honour of god and the blissit virgyn' mary the craftismen of the
samyne' in thar best aray keipt and decoryt the processioun' on' candilmes' day
yerlie quhilkis auld and louable' consuetud the prouest baillies and counsall
Riplie auisit Ratifeit and appreuit the said Rite and statut' and ordanit that
the said craftismen and thar' Successoris sall perpetualie In tyme to cum to obserue
and keip the said processioun' als' honorablie as thai cane And thaj sall
in ordour' to the offering in the play pas' tua and ij to giddir socialie In the
first the flessoris barbouris baxtaris cordinaris skynnaris couparis wrichtis hatmakaris
and bannatmakaris to gidder Walcaris litstaris Wobistaris tailyeouris goldsmythis
blaksmythtis and hemmirmen ande thir craftismen sall furnys' thir pageantis the cor
donaris the messing' Wobistaris and Walcaris Symeon' the smythtis and goldsmythtis iij
kingis of cullane the litstaris the emperour' the masonis the thre knichtis the
tailyeouris our lady Sanct brid' and Sanct elene and the skynnaris the tua
bischopis And tua of Ilk craft to pas' with the pageant that thaj furnys' to
keip thar' geir' and gife ony persone or personis happinnis to failye
and brek ony pointt befor' writtin and beis conuict' tharof sall pay xl s'
to Sanct Nicholes werk and the bailyeis vnlaw vnforgevin And'
to the obseruing' and keping of the samyn all the said craftismen wes oblist
be thar handis wphalding
